ValidationRule.description: To ensure that CusOps does not miss any information, updates to the description field are blocked after creation. RO-1827
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Customer Operations Manager", $Profile.Name <> "Head of Customer Operations", ISCHANGED( Description_RichText__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please comment in chatter to add/change information of an existing case.
